thread.title: Catherine
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Catherine

author: Catherine
title: Catherine
text: Reading through the 12 chapters, it was enlightening to read about the laws of the road that we take for granted. I actually learned a few new facts. For example, I did not know it is against the law to smoke with minors in the car. One of the black marks I have against this website, is that there are many typographical errors throughout the chapters which is a turn-off to the quality of the website. There is also a misstated fact about car seats and when they can be front facing versus rear facing.
